job_description:
• 4+ years of experience in data engineering, analytics engineering, or data management roles.
• Experience building ETL/ELT pipelines using tools such as Airflow, Pentaho, dbt, or similar.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to accuracy and traceability.

• Design and maintain data pipelines and ETL processes to integrate, transform, and validate estimation and consumption data from multiple sources.
